nodeList.description: Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.
Detonating Arrow has increased critical strike chance, but reduced arming time.

node.description: Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

nodeList.altText: {Critical Vulnerability} increased chance to be critically strike. Can stack.
nodeList.description: Detonating Arrow critical strikes deal more damage and it has a chance to apply {Critical Vulnerability} to enemies, making them easier to critically strike.

node.description: Detonating Arrow has increased critical strike chance, but reduced arming time.
Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

nodeList.description: The explosion deals damage in a larger area.

node.description: Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

nodeList.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
nodeList.description: Detonating Arrow has a chance to shock enemies, but the explosion hit deals less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.description: The explosion deals damage in a larger area.
Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

nodeList.altText: As an example, if your current mana is 50 and you consume 10%, Detonating Arrow will deal 5% more damage.
nodeList.description: Detonating Arrow consumes a portion of your current mana to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) equal to the mana consumed.

node.description: The explosion deals damage in a larger area.

nodeList.description: You can store an additional charge of Detonating Arrow.

node.description:
Detonating Arrow deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to stun, but now has a cooldown. 

The explosion deals damage in a significantly larger area (multiplicative with other modifiers).
The explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

node.altText: As an example, if your current mana is 50 and you consume 10%, Detonating Arrow will deal 5% more damage.
node.description: Detonating Arrow consumes a portion of your current mana to deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) equal to the mana consumed.
The explosion deals damage in a larger area.
Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

nodeList.description: Detonating Arrow has a higher chance to freeze enemies.

node.description:
The explosion base lightning damage and added bow damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to lightning damage. It also gains a base freeze rate.

All shock chance from this tree is converted to chill chance and effects related to shock now depend on chill instead.

This has no effect if Detonating Arrow is converted to fire with {Dragon Arrow}.
The explosion deals damage in a larger area.
Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.
Detonating Arrow causes enemies to have less movement speed (multiplicative with other modifiers) while they have an arrow attached.

Detonating Arrow deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a longer arming time. The explosion deals more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per second the arrow spent arming.
Fires an arrow that attatches itself in a target then explodes after 0.6 seconds. Added bow damage is converted to lightning damage.

node.altText: If Detonating Arrow's arming time is removed, this effect cannot occur.
node.description:
When you hit an enemy with Detonating Arrow that already has an arrow attached to them, the explosion deals more damage in a larger area (multiplicative with other modifiers). 

{Suckerpunch Arrow} will not attach an additional Detonating Arrow.

nodeList.description: {Lightning Tendrils} penetrate a portion of enemy lightning resistance and have a chance to shock enemies.

node.altText: {Lightning Tendrils} scales with increases to lightning and bow damage.
node.description:
The explosion causes {Lightning Tendrils} to chain out to nearby targets. 

This has no effect if Detonating Arrow's damage is converted.

nodeList.description:
The explosion now poisons enemies on hit, but hits deal less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and no longer converts added bow damage to lightning.

Shock chance from all sources is converted to poison chance.

This has no effect if Detonating Arrow is converted to fire or cold with {Dragon Arrow} or {Frostfang Arrow}.
